protein.specific_function: May be similar to that of authentic calmodulin and may actually compete with calmodulin by binding, with different affinities, to cellular substrates

reference.reference_text: Yaswen P, Smoll A, Peehl DM, Trask DK, Sager R, Stampfer MR: Down-regulation of a calmodulin-related gene during transformation of human mammary epithelial cells. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1990 Oct;87(19):7360-4.
